name: Attack
note:
Skill #1 will be used when you select
the Attack command.
If <srpgWeaponSkill:X> is set on the
equipped weapon, the skill is used instead.

<srpgRange:-1>
<specialRange:weapon>
(srpgRangeを -1 にすると、武器・エネミーの
 メモの weaponRange が適用されます)
(specialRangeを weapon にすると、
 武器・アクター・職業・エネミーの
 メモの specialRange が適用されます)

name: Guard
note:
Skill #2 will be used when you select
the Guard command.

description: Range attack 1 (for actor)
name: Attack
note:
<srpgRange:1>
<srpgAreaRange:1>
<srpgAreaType:allEnemy>
<mapBattle:true>
・射程内の全員に対する攻撃は
　AoEを利用しているため、
　srpgAreaRange:x を 1 以上にする
・なお、通常のAoEを利用しても
　同様のものが作れるが、
　例示のため この形にしている。

description: Range attack 2-4 (for actor)
name: Attack
note:
<srpgRange:4>
<srpgMinRange:2>
<srpgAreaRange:1>
<srpgAreaType:allEnemy>
<mapBattle:true>
・射程内の全員に対する攻撃は
　AoEを利用しているため、
　srpgAreaRange:x を 1 以上にする
・なお、通常のAoEを利用しても
　同様のものが作れるが、
　例示のため この形にしている。

description: Range attack 3, can attack up to 3 targets
name: Attack

description: Power increases by Lv
name: Attack

description:
Power increases by HP
(Power varies from 50~150% at 0~100% HP)
name: Attack

description:
Power increases as HP decreases
(Power varies from 200~50% at 0~100% HP)
name: Attack

description:
Power increases only when HP is full
(200% power at 100% HP, 75% power otherwise)
name: Attack

description:
Power increases as TP increases
(Power varies from 100~200% at 0~100 TP)
name: Attack

description:
Power increases by movement distance
(75% power at 0 movement, then increases by 25%)
name: Attack

description:
Power decreases by movement distance
(200% power at 0 movement, then decreases by 25%)
name: Attack

description:
Power increases by movement distance
(75% power at 1 movement, then increases by 25%)
name: Attack

description: Diagonal + magic attack
name: Attack

description:
Power increases with diagonal + movement distance
(75% power at 0 distance, then increases by 25%)
name: Attack

description:
Power increases by opponent Lv
(1 Lv difference increases power by 10%)
name: Attack

description: High-powered attack
name: Assault

description:
With speed invocation of 2000, you can act before
the leading side
name: Preemptive Strike

description:
Long-Range Attacks. By adding a minimum range,
it can be used as a normal attack when approached.
name: Shuriken

description: Poisonous Attacks
name: Poison Attack

description:
Increase evasion rate. Same as defense, set the speed
invocation to 2000 and activate it first.
name: Evacuate

description:
Prevent state abnormalities. Same as defense,set the speed
invocation to 2000 and activated first.
name: Abnormality Prevention

description:
Reflect magic attack. Same as defense,set the speed
invocation to 2000 and activated first.
name: Magic Reflection

description:
Respond to support from allies with recovery
Respond to attacks from the enemy normally
name: Blessing

description:
Recover your own HP
(Explanation in note)
name: Regeneration 再生
note:
<srpgRange:0>
自身を対象とする応戦スキルは
発動条件を満たしやすいので、
優先度が高い場合は、下位の応戦スキルが
発動しにくくなる可能性がある。

description: Increase attack power
name: Anger

description: Increase defense
name: Curing

description: Grant weapon destruction
name: Crushed Blade

description: 100% physical evasion
name: God Avoidance

description:
Weak attack. Use it as a debuff by inflicting it
on the enemy
name: Desperate Attack

description: Consume MP to recover TP
name: Magic Bullet Loading

description: Consumes TP to recover MP
name: Magic Conversion

description:
Fire magic attack on a single enemy. [Flame]
Circular attack range with minimum range. [Range 2-3]
name: Elfire

description:
Fire magic attack on enemies within range. It has a circular area of effect.
[Fire] [Range 2-4] [Range 3]
name: Flare Land

description:
Ice magic attack on a single enemy. Linear attack range.
[Ice] [Range 3 (straight line)]
name: Ice Sword

description:
Ice magic attack on enemies in range. It has a diagonal area of effect.
[Ice] [Range 4 (straight line)] [Range 4 (diagonal)]
name: Frozen

description:
Lightning magic attack on a single enemy. A long-range diagonal skill.
[Lightning] [Range 6 (diagonal)]
name: Thunderbolt

description:
Lightning magic attack on enemies within range. A cross-shaped area of effect magic.
[Lightning] [Range 8 (diagonal)] [Range 3 (linear)]
name: Lightning

description:
A light magic attack on a single enemy, with an attack range extending in eight directions.
[Sacred] [Range 3 (Radiant)]
name: Holy Arrow

description:
Light magic attack on enemies in range. Special grid-shaped area of effect.
[Sacred] [Range 4 (Radiant)] [Range 3 (Grating)]
name: Shine

description:
A dark magic attack on a single enemy. Non-8 directions special range.
[Darkness] [Range 3 (non-8 directions)]
name: Darkness

description:
Dark magic attack on enemies in range. Draws the target to the center of its range.
[Darkness] [Range 4 (non-8 directions)] [Range 3 (radiant)]
name: Chaos Gate

description:
Non-elemental magic attack on a single enemy.
[Non-Elemnetal] [Range 3].
name: Burst

description:
Non-elemental magic attack on enemies within range. The most
basic form of ranged attack. [Non-Elemental] [Range 4] [Area Range 3]
name: Explosion

description:
Absorbs the HP of a single enemy.
[Range 2-3]
name: Life Divide

description:
Absorbs MP of a single enemy.
[Range 2-3]
name: Magic Snatch

description:
Increases allies' attack power for 3 turns.
[Range 3] [Area Range 2]
name: Power up

description:
Increases allies' defense for 3 turns.
[Range 3] [Area Range 2]
name: Guard up

description:
Increases allies' movement for 3 turns.
[Range 3] [Area Range 2]
name: Move up

description:
Decreases enemies' attack power for 3 turns.
[Range 3] [Area Range 2]
name: Power Down

description:
Decreases enemies' defense for 3 turns.
[Range 3] [Area Range 2]
name: Guard Down

description:
Inflicts "poison" on a single enemy.
HP decreases gradually. [Range 3] [Poison]
name: Poison

description:
Inflicts "paralysis" on a single enemy.
Movement is reduced. [Range 3] [Paralysis]
name: Paralyze

description:
Seals an enemy. Disables general magic.
[Range 3] [Magic Seal].
name: Magic Seal

description:
Inflicts "dizziness" on a single enemy. The enemy
will unable to counter. [Range 3] [Dizzy]
name: Flash

description:
Inflicts "confusion" on a single enemy. It attacks
enemies or allies randomly. [Range 3] [Confusion]
name: Confuse

description:
Inflicts "sleep" on a single enemy. The enemy is
unable to act. [Range 3] [Sleep]
name: Sleep

description:
Moves instantaneously to the specified position.
[Range 4]
name: Teleport

description:
Summons Reid for 3 turns. Lv will be the same as
the caster. [Range 3] [Reid: actor (auto battle)]
name: Summon Reid

description:
Summons pillars of flame at the specified position for 3 turns. [Range 3]
[Pillars of flame: object (neither enemies nor allies can pass through)]
name: Flame Wall

description:
Attack powered magic that targets enemies in front of you.
[Flame] [Range 1] [Area Range 3 (forward)]
name: Ninjutsu "Fire Lizard"

description:
Attack powered magic that targets enemies in a horizontal line.
[Ice] [Range 2] [Range 2 (horizontal)]
name: Ninjutsu "Water Snake"

description:
Attack powered magic that targets enemies in a square area.
[Lightning] [Area Range 2 (perimeter)]
name: Ninjutsu "Thunder Turtle"

description:
Allows you to move through enemies for 3 turns.
[Range: Self] [No turn consumption & unavailable after movement]
name: Ninjutsu "Shadow Crossing"

description:
In same turn, change the player's evasion to "Divine Evasion".
[Range: self] [Response change: Divine Evasion: Physical Evasion 100%].
name: Ninjitsu "God Evasion"

description:
For 3 turns, change a single ally's counter-attack skill to "Preemptive Attack".
[Range 3] [Response Change: Preemptive Attack: Attack Speed +2000]
name: Ninjitsu "Sneak Attack"

description:
For 1~3 turns, the enemy's counterattack skill is changed to "Desperate Attack".
[Range 3] [Response change: Desperate Attack: Weak Attack]
name: Ninjutsu "Herohero"

description:
A strong attack that hits all enemies on the map and cannot be countered.
[Range: All enemies]
name: Mystery "Hyakki Yakou"
note:
<srpgRange:999>
<specialRange:allEnemy>
<srpgAreaRange:1>
<srpgAreaType:allEnemy>
<doubleAction:false>
<mapBattle:true>
<srpgUncounterable>

1. By setting "specialRange:allEnemy",
   the range skill become infinite.
2. By setting "srpgAreaType:allEnemy",
   all enemies within range = all enemies on the map
   are targeted by AoE.
⇒ It becomes an all-out attack against
   enemies.

description:
Restores the HP of a single ally.
[Range 3]
name: Heal

description:
Restores the HP of nearby allies.
[Range 3 (surroundings)]
name: Heal Area
note:
<srpgRange:3>
<srpgVariableRange>
<srpgAreaRange:1>
<srpgAreaType:allActor>
<mapBattle:true>
射程内全員に対する攻撃は
AoEを利用しているため、
srpgAreaRange:x を 1 以上にする

description:
Restores HP of all allies.
[Range All Allies]
name: Heal All
note:
<srpgRange:999>
<specialRange:allActor>
<srpgAreaRange:1>
<srpgAreaType:allActor>
<mapBattle:true>
specialRangeをallActorにすることで
無限射程スキルとし、さらに
srpgAreaTypeをallActorにすることで
範囲内のすべてのactor＝
マップ上のすべてのactorをAoEの対象にする
⇒全体回復スキルになる

description:
Cures one ally's status ailments. [Range 3]
[Recover Poison/Paralysis/Seal/Dizziness/Confusion/Sleep]
name: Cure

description:
Recovers one ally from being incapacitated.
[Range 3]
name: Revive

description:
Light attribute magic attack on surrounding enemies.
[Holy] [Range 4 (surroundings)]
name: Judgment of Heaven
note:
<srpgRange:4>
<srpgVariableRange>
<srpgAreaRange:1>
<srpgAreaType:allEnemy>
<doubleAction:false>
<mapBattle:true>
射程内全員に対する攻撃は
AoEを利用しているため、
srpgAreaRange:x を 1 以上にする

description:
Increases own attack range for 3 turns.
[Range: Self] [No turn consumption & cannot be used after moving]
name: Gale Lance

description:
Increases own movement for 3 turns.
[Range: Self] [No turn consumption & cannot be used after moving]
name: Sylphide

description:
For 3 turns, put yourself in the "flying" state.
[Range: Self] [No turn consumption & cannot be used after moving]
name: Ray Wing

description:
A spear attack with momentum. The longer the distance traveled, the more powerful it becomes.
[Range Weapon Dependence]
name: Horse Riding

description:
An assault with a spear that ignores defense. Move towards your opponent.
[Range 3 (straight line)] [Movement (stops if there is an enemy or ally in the path)]
name: Rush

description:
Swing your spear around to attack all enemies in front of you.
[Range 2-2] [Area Range 3 (arc)]
name: Break Down

description:
Adds "50% poison" to normal attacks for 3 turns.
[Range: Self] [No turn consumption & cannot be used after moving]
name: Poison Arrow

description:
Adds "50% paralysis" to normal attacks for 3 turns.
[Range: Self] [No turn consumption & cannot be used after moving]
name: Numb Arrow

description:
Add "50% Seal" to normal attacks for 3 turns.
[Range: Self] [No turn consumption & Cannot be used after movement].
name: Arrow of Curse

description:
Adds "50% Dizzy" to normal attacks for 3 turns.
[Range: Self] [No turn consumption/cannot be used after moving]
name: Shock Arrow

description:
Inflicts "Confusion" on enemies within range.
[Range 3] [Area Range 3] [Inflict Confusion 50%]
name: Flash Ball

description:
Inflicts "sleep" on enemies within range.
[Range 3] [Area Range 3] [Inflict Sleep 50%]
name: Sleep Ball

description:
Attacks a single enemy and reduces attack power
for 3 turns. [Range Weapon Dependence]
name: Power Break

description:
Attacks a single enemy and reduces defense for 3 turns.
[Range Weapon Dependence]
name: Armor Break

description:
Attacks a single enemy and reduces speed for 3 turns.
[Range Weapon Dependence]
name: Speed Break

description:
Attacks a single enemy and moves it 1 square away.
[Range 1] [Push, Ineffective against large enemies]
name: Cheat

description:
Blows away enemies in front of you with an attack. Power increases when used on the spot.
[Range 1] [Area Range 2] [Push, Ineffective against large enemies]
name: Tyrant Blow

description:
While dancing for 3 turns, increases the attack power
of surrounding allies. [Range: Self] [Cancel other dance]
name: Battle Belly Dance

description:
While dancing for 3 turns, increases the defence
of surrounding allies. [Range: Self] [Cancel other dance]
name: Protective Tango

description:
While dancing for 3 turns, increases the movement
of surrounding allies. [Range: Self] [Cancel other dance]
name: Samba Movement

description:
While dancing for 3 turns, magic damage around you
is halved. [Range: Self] [Cancel other dance].
name: Shrine Maiden Dance

description:
While dancing for 3 turns, heals the HP of surrounding
allies slightly. [Range: Self] [Cancel other dance]
name: Healing Hula

description:
Removes the "End of Action" status of an ally
and makes him/her act again. [Range 3]
name: Restart Step

description:
Fires magic as bullets. Straight range, but blocked
by enemies. [Range 5 (straight/line of sight)]
name: Ether Buster

description:
Attacks with a spell power projectile. Kills enemies whose level is
a multiple of 5 instantly. [Range 5 (straight/line of sight)]
name: Level 5 Death

description:
A magic gun for fighting strong enemies. The higher the opponent's level,
the more powerful it is. [Range 5 (straight/line of sight)
name: Giant Killing

description:
A magic gun that turns life force into power. The higher
the 1st digit of the current HP, the more powerful it is. [Range 5 (straight/line of sight)
name: 1st Digit Sniper

description:
Bombardment by magic weapons. Attack an opponent
at any distance. [Range: infinite]
name: Stellar Blaster

description:
Increases own attack power for 3 turns. [Range: Self]
[No turn consumption & unavailable after movement].
name: Brave Force

description:
Attacks a single enemy 2 times.
[Range Weapon Dependence]
name: Multi Sword

description:
遠距離攻撃
最低射程をつけることで、接近されると通常攻撃にできる
name: Leaf Cutter

description:
即死攻撃（デス）
武器射程内からの攻撃を事実上封じる
name: Death Scythe

description:
遠距離攻撃（ゴーレム）
武器が直線射程なので、斜めから攻撃されると発動する
name: Uzushio

description:
遠距離攻撃（ラスボス）
無限射程で、どんな相手にも反撃する
name: False God Spear

description:
敵単体の攻撃力を３ターン低下させる。
【射程 2】
name: Cry

description:
敵単体の防御力を３ターン低下させる。
【射程 2】
name: Ghost Touch

description:
敵単体の敏捷を３ターン低下させる。
【射程 2】
name: Intimidation

description:
３ターン、自分の攻撃力をアップする。
【射程 自分自身】【ターン消費なし／移動後使用不可】
name: Power cause

description:
３ターン、自分の防御力をアップする。
【射程 自分自身】【ターン消費なし／移動後使用不可】
name: Hardening

description:
敵単体に攻撃と共に、１マス向こうへ移動させる。
【射程 1】
name: Body blow

description:
相手のHPを吸収する。
【射程 1】
name: Soul-sucking

description:
大鎌を飛ばし、周囲の敵を攻撃する。
【範囲 2（周囲/８方向以外）】
name: Stairway to Hell
note:
<srpgRange:2>
<specialRange:knight>
<srpgAreaRange:1>
<srpgAreaType:allActor>
<doubleAction:false>
<mapBattle:true>
射程内全員に対する攻撃は
AoEを利用しているため、
srpgAreaRange:x を 1 以上にする

description:
３ターン、味方をバーサク状態にする。
【射程 1-3】バーサク：敵を攻撃、応戦変化（強撃）
name: Berserk

description:
敵単体に攻撃と共に、麻痺を付与する。
【射程 武器依存】
name: Shadow Sewing

description:
周囲の敵に攻撃する。
【範囲 2（周囲）】
name: Bunmawashi
note:
<srpgRange:2>
<specialRange:king>
<srpgAreaRange:1>
<srpgAreaType:allEnemy>
<doubleAction:false>
<mapBattle:true>
射程内全員に対する攻撃は
AoEを利用しているため、
srpgAreaRange:x を 1 以上にする

description:
敵単体に攻撃と共に、めまいを付与する。
【射程 2-2（直線）】
name: Trick the cat

description:
３ターン、自身の移動力をアップする。
【射程 自分自身】【ターン消費なし／移動後使用不可】
name: Shrinkage

description:
敵単体に攻撃と共に、大きく移動させる。
【射程 1】
name: Fukitobashi

description:
前方の敵に攻撃力依存・炎属性のブレス攻撃。
【炎】【射程 1】【範囲 5（前方）】
name: Dragon Breath

description:
マップ上の全ての敵に必中・応戦不可の魔法攻撃。
【範囲 敵全体】
name: Diesmare ディエス・イレ
note:
<srpgRange:999>
<specialRange:allActor>
<srpgAreaRange:1>
<srpgAreaType:allActor>
<doubleAction:false>
<mapBattle:true>
<srpgUncounterable>
specialRangeをallActorにすることで
無限射程スキルとし、さらに
srpgAreaTypeをallActorにすることで
範囲内のすべてのActor＝
マップ上のすべてのActorをAoEの対象にする
⇒Actorに対する全体攻撃になる

description:
３ターン、周囲の敵に対してオーラ効果を与える
【射程 自分自身】
name: Aura of Intimidation
